title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 89.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 § 89.1 - General

State Regulations

Tax Law, §§ 471-b, 471-c

Except as otherwise provided in this Subchapter or the

Tax Law, all tobacco products: (a) possessed in New York State by any person for sale; or
(b) used in New York State by any person; are subject to the tobacco products tax imposed pursuant
to article 20 of such law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§
89.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
